words.id: Haa Miim
words.en: Ha Meem

translations.text: Haa-Meeem

words.id: demi kitab||yang nyata
words.en: By the Book||the clear

translations.text: Wal-Kitaabil Mubeen

words.id: sesungguhnya Kami||Kami jadikannya||Al Qur'an||bahasa Arab||agar kalian||kalian menggunakan akal
words.en: Indeed We||have made it||a Quran||(in) Arabic||so that you may||understand

translations.text: innaa ja'alnaahu Quraanan Arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qiloon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya ia/Al Qur'an||dalam||induk||Al kitab||di sisi Kami||benar-benar tinggi||hikmah
words.en: And indeed it||(is) in||(the) Mother||(of) the Book||with Us||surely exalted||full of wisdom

translations.text: Wa-innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem

words.id: apakah maka Kami jadikan||dari kalian||pengajaran/Al Qur'an||hentikan||karena||kalian adalah||kaum||orang-orang yang melampaui batas
words.en: Then should We take away||from you||the Reminder||disregarding (you)||because||you||(are) a people||transgressing

translations.text: Afa-nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen

words.id: dan berapa banyak||telah Kami turunkan||dari||nabi-nabi||pada||ummat-ummat terdahulu
words.en: And how many||We sent||of||a Prophet||among||the former (people)

translations.text: Wa-kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen

words.id: dan tidak||datang kepada mereka||dari||seorang nabi||kecuali||mereka adalah||kepadanya||mereka memperolok-olok
words.en: And not||came to them||any Prophet||any Prophet||but||they used (to)||mock at him||mock at him

translations.text: Wa-maa ya'teehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

words.id: maka Kami binasakan||sangat||dari mereka||kekuatan||dan telah lewat||perumpamaan||orang-orang terdahulu
words.en: Then We destroyed||stronger||than them||(in) power||and has passed||(the) example||(of) the former (people)

translations.text: Fa-ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw Wa-madaa masalul awwaleen

words.id: dan jika||kamu bertanya kepada mereka||siapakah||yang menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||tentu mereka mengatakan||menciptakan mereka semua||Maha perkasa||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And if||you ask them||Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||They will surely say||Has created them||the All-Mighty||the All-Knower

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunna khalaqa-hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem

words.id: yang||menjadikan||bagi kalian||bumi||tempat menetap||dan menjadikan||bagi kalian||diatasnya||jalan-jalan||agar kalian||kalian mendapat petunjuk
words.en: The One Who||made||for you||the earth||a bed||and made||for you||therein||roads||so that you may||be guided

translations.text: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan la'allakum tahtadoon

words.id: dan yang||menurunkan||dari||langit||air||menurut ukuran||lalu Kami hidupkan||dengannya||negeri||mati||seperti demikian||kamu dikeluarkan
words.en: And the One Who||sends down||from||the sky||water||in (due) measure||then We revive||with it||a land||dead||thus||you will be brought forth

translations.text: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an biqadarin fa-ansharnaa bihee baldatan maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon

words.id: dan yang||menciptakan||berpasangan||semuanya||dan menjadikan||bagi kalian||dari||bahtera||dan binatang ternak||apa yang||kamu kendarai
words.en: And the One Who||created||the pairs||all of them||and made||for you||[of]||the ships||and the cattle||what||you ride

translations.text: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa Wa-ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon

words.id: supaya kamu sama(duduk)||atas||punggungnya||kemudian||kamu ingat||nikmat||Tuhan kalian||apabila||kamu sama duduk||atasnya||dan kamu mengucapkan||Maha Suci Dia||yang||menundukkan||untuk kami||ini||dan tidaklah||kami||baginya||menguasai

translations.text: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izas tawaitum alaihi Wa-taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza Wa-maa kunnaa lahoo muqrineen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya kami||kepada||Tuhan kami||benar-benar orang yang kembali
words.en: And indeed we||to||our Lord||will surely return

translations.text: Wa-innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa lamunqaliboon

words.id: dan mereka menjadikan||baginya||sebagian dari||hamba-hamba-Nya||bahagian||sesungguhnya||manusia||benar-benar ingkar||nyata
words.en: But they attribute||to Him||from||His slaves||a portion||Indeed||man||surely (is) clearly ungrateful||surely (is) clearly ungrateful

translations.text: Wa-ja'aloo lahoo min ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la-kafoorun mubeen

words.id: atau||Dia mengambil||dari apa||Dia ciptakan||anak perempuan||dan Dia pilih kamu||dengan anak laki-laki
words.en: Or||has He taken||of what||He has created||daughters||and He has chosen (for) you||sons

translations.text: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw Wa-asfaakum bilbaneen

words.id: dan apabila||diberi kabar gembira||salah seorang di antara mereka||dengan apa||menjadikan||bagi Yang Maha Pengasih||perumpamaan||jadilah||mukanya||hitam pekat||dan dia||menahan marah
words.en: And when||is given good news||(to) one of them||of what||he sets up||for the Most Gracious||(as) a likeness||becomes||his face||dark||and he||(is) filled with grief

translations.text: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir-Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem

words.id: ataukah orang||dibesarkan||dalam||perhiasan||dan dia||dalam||terang||tidak||nyata
words.en: Then (is one) who||is brought up||in||ornaments||and he||in||the dispute||(is) not||clear

translations.text: Awa-maien yunashsha'u fil hilyati Wa-huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen

words.id: dan mereka menjadikan||malaikat-malaikat||orang-orang yang||mereka itu||hamba-hamba||Maha Pengasih||orang-orang perempuan||apakah mereka menyaksikan||penciptaan mereka||kelak akan ditulis||persaksian mereka||dan mereka akan ditanya
words.en: And they made||the Angels||those who||themselves||(are) slaves||(of) the Most Gracious||females||Did they witness||their creation||Will be recorded||their testimony||and they will be questioned

translations.text: Wa-ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; a-shahidoo khalqahum; satuktabu shahaadatuhum Wa-yus'aloon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||jika||menghendaki||Maha Pengasih||tidak||kami menyembah mereka||tidak ada||bagi mereka||demikian itu||dari||pengetahuan||tidak lain||mereka||kecuali||mereka mengada-adakan kebohongan
words.en: And they say||If||had willed||the Most Gracious||(we would) not||have worshiped them||Not||they have||about that||any||knowledge||Nothing||they (do)||but||lie

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon

words.id: atau||Kami berikan pada mereka||sebuah kitab||dari||sebelumnya||lalu mereka||dengannya||mereka berpegang
words.en: Or||have We given them||a book||before it||before it||so they||to it||(are) holding fast

translations.text: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon

words.id: bahkan||mereka berkata||sesungguhnya kami||kami mendapati||bapak-bapak kami||atas||ummat||dan sesungguhnya kami||atas||bekas-bekas mereka||orang-orang yang mendapat petunjuk
words.en: Nay||they say||Indeed we||[we] found||our forefathers||upon||a religion||and indeed we||on||their footsteps||(are) guided

translations.text: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muhtadoon

words.id: dan demikian itu||tidak||Kami mengutus||dari||sebelum kamu||dalam||suatu negeri||dari||seorang pemberi peringatan||kecuali||berkata||orang-orang mewah hidupnya||sesungguhnya kami||mendapati||bapak-bapak kami||atas||ummat||dan sesungguhnya kami||atas||bekas-bekas mereka||orang-orang pengikut
words.en: And thus||not||We sent||before you||before you||in||a town||any||warner||except||said||(the) wealthy ones of it||Indeed, we||[we] found||our forefathers||on||a religion||and indeed, we||[on]||their footsteps||(are) following

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muqtadoon

words.id: (Rasul) berkata||apakah meskipun||aku datang||dengan petunjuk||dari pada apa||kamu dapati||atasnya||bapak-bapak kamu||mereka berkata||sesungguhnya kami||terhadap apa||kamu di utus||dengannya||orang-orang yang ingkar
words.en: He said||Even if||I brought you||better guidance||than what||you found||on it||your forefathers||They said||Indeed we||with what||you are sent||with [it]||(are) disbelievers

translations.text: Qaala awa-law ji'tukum bi-ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon

words.id: maka Kami siksa||diantara mereka||maka perhatikanlah||bagaimana||adalah||akibat||orang-orang yang mendustakan
words.en: So We took retribution||from them||Then see||how||was||(the) end||(of) the deniers

translations.text: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana aaqibatul mukazzibeen

words.id: dan ketika||berkata||Ibrahim||kepada bapaknya||dan kaumnya||sesungguhnya aku||berlepas diri||dari apa||kamu sembah
words.en: And when||Ibrahim said||Ibrahim said||to his father||and his people||Indeed, I (am)||disassociated||from what||you worship

translations.text: Wa-iz qaala ibraaheemu li-abeehi Wa-qawmiheee innanee baraaa'un mimmaa ta'budoon

words.id: kecuali||yang||menciptakan aku||maka sesungguhnya Dia||akan memberi petunjuk kepadaku
words.en: Except||the One Who||created me||and indeed He||will guide me

translations.text: illal lazee fataranee fa-innahoo sa-yahdeen

words.en: And he made it||a word||lasting||among||his descendents||so that they may||return

translations.text: Wa-ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee aqibihee la-'allahum yarji'oon

words.id: bahkan||Aku telah memberi kesenangan||mereka itu||dan bapak-bapak mereka||sehingga||datang kepada mereka||kebenaran||dan seorang rasul||memberi penjelasan
words.en: Nay||I gave enjoyment||(to) these||and their forefathers||until||came to them||the truth||and a Messenger||clear

translations.text: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a-humul haqqu Wa-Rasoolun mubeen

words.en: And when||came to them||the truth||they said||This||(is) magic||and indeed we||of it||(are) disbelievers

translations.text: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw Wa-innaa bihee kaafiroon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||ini||Al Qur'an||atas||seorang laki-laki||dari||dua negeri||besar
words.en: And they say||Why not||was sent down||this||the Quran||to||a man||from||the two towns||great

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo law-laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 'azeem

words.id: mengapa mereka||mereka membagi-bagi||rahmat||Tuhanmu||Kami||Kami membagi-bagi||diantara mereka||penghidupan mereka||dalam||kehidupan||dunia||dan Kami tinggikan||sebagian mereka||di atas||sebagian||derajat||agar mengambil||sebagian mereka||sebagian||pekerjaan||dan rahmat||Tuhanmu||lebih baik||dari apa||mereka kumpulkan
words.en: Do they||distribute||(the) Mercy||(of) your Lord||We||[We] distribute||among them||their livelihood||in||the life||(of) the world||and We raise||some of them||above||others||(in) degrees||so that may take||some of them||others||(for) service||But (the) Mercy||(of) your Lord||(is) better||than what||they accumulate

translations.text: 'A-hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatin li-yattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; Wa-rahmatu Rabbika khairun mimmaa yajma'oon

words.id: dan jika tidak||bahwa||adalah||manusia||ummat||satu||tentu Kami jadikan||bagi orang||ingkar||kepada Yang Maha Pengasih||bagi rumah-rumah mereka||atap||dari||perak||dan tangga||atasnya||mereka menaiki
words.en: And if not||that||(would) become||[the] mankind||a community||one||We (would have) made||for (one) who||disbelieves||in the Most Gracious||for their houses||roofs||of||silver||and stairways||upon which||they mount

translations.text: Wa-law-laaa aien yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limaien yakfuru bir-Rahmaani li-buyootihim suqufan min fiddatinw Wa-ma'aarija alaihaa yazharoon

words.id: dan bagi rumah-rumah mereka||pintu-pintu||dan ranjang/dipan||atasnya||mereka bersandar
words.en: And for their houses||doors||and couches||upon which||they recline

translations.text: Wa-li-buyootihim abwaabanw Wa-sururan alaihaa yattaki'oon

words.id: dan perhiasan-perhiasan||dan tidaklah||semua||demikian itu||melainkan||kesenangan||kehidupan||dunia||dan akhirat||di sisi||Tuhanmu||bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa
words.en: And ornaments of gold||And not (is)||all||that||but||an enjoyment||(of) the life||(of) the world||And the Hereafter||with||your Lord||(is) for the righteous

translations.text: Wa-zukhrufaa; Wa-in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal-aakhiratu inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen

words.id: dan barang siapa||berpaling||dari||mengingat||Maha Pengasih||Kami tentukan||baginya||syaitan||maka ia/syaitan||baginya||teman
words.en: And whoever||turns away||from||(the) remembrance||(of) the Most Gracious||We appoint||for him||a devil||then he||(is) to him||a companion

translations.text: Wa-maien ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo qareen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya mereka||benar-benar menghalangi mereka||dari||jalan||dan mereka mengira||bahwa sesungguhnya mereka||mendapat petunjuk
words.en: And indeed they||surely turn them away||from||the Path||and they think||that they||(are) guided

translations.text: Wa-innahum la-yasuddoo-nahum anis sabeeli Wa-yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon

words.id: sehingga||apabila||datang kepada Kami||dia berkata||seandainya||antara aku||dan antara kamu||sejauh||dua masyrik/barat dan timur||maka sejahat-jahat||teman
words.en: Until||when||he comes to Us||he says||O would that||between me||and between you||(were the) distance||(of) the East and the West||How wretched is||the companion!

translations.text: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa-laita bainee Wa-bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen

words.id: dan tidak||memberi manfaat kepadamu||hari itu||apabila||kalian telah menganiaya||sesungguhnya kamu||dalam||azab||orang-orang yang bersekutu
words.en: And will never||benefit you||the Day||when||you have wronged||that you||(will be) in||the punishment||sharing

translations.text: Wa-lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil azaabi mushtarikoon

words.id: apakah maka kamu||dapat menjadikan mendengar||orang yang tuli||atau||kamu beri petunjuk||orang yang buta||dan orang||adalah||dalam||kesesatan||nyata
words.en: Then can you||cause to hear||the deaf||or||guide||the blind||and (one) who||is||in||an error||clear

translations.text: Afa-anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya Wa-man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen

words.id: maka jika||sungguh Kami wafatkan||dengan kamu||maka sesungguhnya Kami||dari mereka||orang-orang yang disiksa
words.en: And whether||We take you away||We take you away||then indeed, We||from them||(will) take retribution

translations.text: Fa-immaa nazhabanna bika fa-innaa minhum muntaqimoon

words.id: atau||Kami perlihatkan kepadamu||yang(azab)||Kami ancamkan kepada kamu||maka sesungguhnya Kami||atas mereka||berkuasa
words.en: Or||We show you||that which||We have promised them||then indeed We||over them||have full power

translations.text: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa-innaa alaihim muqtadiroon

words.id: maka berpegang teguhlah kamu||kepada apa yang||diwahyukan||kepadamu||sesungguhnya kamu||di atas||jalan||lurus
words.en: So hold fast||to that which||is revealed||to you||Indeed you||(are) on||a Path||Straight

translations.text: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem

words.id: dan sesungguhnya ia||benar-benar pengajaran||bagimu||dan bagi kaummu||dan kelak||kamu akan ditanya
words.en: And indeed it||(is) surely a Reminder||for you||and your people||and soon||you will be questioned

translations.text: Wa-innahoo la-zikrun laka Wa-liqawmika Wa-sawfa tus'aloon

words.id: dan tanyakan||orang(rasul-rasul)||Kami utus||dari||sebelum kamu||dari||rasul-rasul Kami||adakah Kami jadikan||dari||selain||Maha Pengasih||tuhan-tuhan||maka disembah
words.en: And ask||(those) whom||We sent||before you||before you||of||Our Messengers||did We make||besides||besides||the Most Gracious||gods||to be worshipped

translations.text: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a-ja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany yu'badoon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mengutus||Musa||dengan ayat-ayat Kami||kepada||Fir'aun||dan pemuka-pemukanya||maka dia berkata||sesungguhnya aku||utusan||Tuhan||semesta alam
words.en: And certainly||We sent||Musa||with Our Signs||to||Firaun||and his chiefs||and he said||Indeed I am||a Messenger||(of the) Lord||(of) the worlds

translations.text: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen

words.id: maka tatkala||dia datang pada mereka||dengan ayat-ayat Kami||tiba-tiba||mereka||daripadanya||mereka mentertawakan
words.en: But when||he came to them||with Our Signs||behold!||They||at them||laughed

translations.text: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi-aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon

words.id: dan tidak||Kami perlihatkan pada mereka||dari||suatu ayat||kecuali||ia/ayat||lebih besar||dari||saudaranya||dan Kami timpakan kepada mereka||dengan azab||supaya mereka||mereka kembali
words.en: And not||We showed them||of||a Sign||but||it||(was) greater||than||its sister||and We seized them||with the punishment||so that they may||return

translations.text: Wa-maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa Wa-akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||hai||ahli sihir||berdo'alah kamu||untuk kami||Tuhanmu||dengan apa||Dia janjikan||di sisimu||sesungguhnya kami||benar-benar mendapat petunjuk
words.en: And they said||O||[the] magician!||Invoke||for us||your Lord||by what||He has made covenant||with you||Indeed we||(will) surely be guided

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo yaaa-ayyuhas saahirud 'ou lanaa Rabbaka bimaa ahida indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon

words.id: maka tatkala||Kami hilangkan||dari mereka||azab||tiba-tiba||mereka||mereka memungkiri
words.en: But when||We removed||from them||the punishment||behold!||They||broke (their word)

translations.text: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba izaa hum yankusoon

words.id: dan berseru||Fir'aun||kepada||kaumnya||dia berkata||wahai kaumku||bukankah||kepunyaanku||kerajaan||Mesir||dan ini||sungai-sungai||mengalir||dari||bawahku||apakah maka tidak||kamu melihat
words.en: And called out||Firaun||among||his people||he said||O my people||Is not||for me||(the) kingdom||(of) Egypt||and these||[the] rivers||flowing||underneath me||underneath me||Then do not||you see

translations.text: Wa-naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa-qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra Wa-haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon

words.id: bukankah||aku||lebih baik||dari||ini||yang||ia||orang yang hina||dan tidak||hampir||ia menjelaskan
words.en: Or||am I||better||than||this||one who||he||(is) insignificant||and hardly||and hardly||clear

translations.text: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw Wa-laa yakaadu yubeen

words.id: maka mengapa tidak||dilemparkan||kepadanya||gelang||dari||emas||atau||datang||bersama ia||malaikat||menyertai
words.en: Then why not||are placed||on him||bracelets||of||gold||or||come||with him||the Angels||accompanying (him)

translations.text: Falaw-laa ulqiya alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen

words.id: maka ia meremehkan||kaumnya||lalu mereka patuh kepadanya||sesungguhnya mereka||adalah mereka||kaum||orang-orang yang fasik
words.en: So he bluffed||his people||and they obeyed him||Indeed they||were||a people||defiantly disobedient

translations.text: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa-ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

words.id: maka tatkala||mereka membuat Kami murka||Kami hukum||dari mereka||lalu Kami tenggelamkan mereka||semua
words.en: So when||they angered Us||We took retribution||from them||and We drowned them||all

translations.text: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa-aghraqnaahum ajma'een

words.id: maka Kami jadikan mereka||terdahulu||dan perumpamaan||bagi orang-orang yang kemudian
words.en: And We made them||a precedent||and an example||for the later (generations)

translations.text: Faja'alnaahum salafanw Wa-masalan lil-aakhireen

words.id: dan tatkala||dijadikan||anak||Maryam||perumpamaan||tiba-tiba||kaummu||karenanya||mereka gempar/bersorak
words.en: And when||is presented||(the) son||(of) Maryam||(as) an example||behold!||Your people||about it||laughed aloud

translations.text: Wa-lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmuka minhu yasiddoon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||apakah Tuhan kami||lebih baik||atau||dia||tidak||mereka menjadikannya||bagimu||kecuali||bantahan||bahkan||mereka||kaum||mereka bertengkar
words.en: And they said||Are our gods||better||or||he||Not||they present it||to you||except||(for) argument||Nay||they||(are) a people||argumentative

translations.text: Wa-qaalooo a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; bal hum qawmun khasimoon

words.id: tidak lain||dia||kecuali||seorang hamba||Kami beri nikmat||atasnya||dan Kami jadikan dia||perumpamaan||bagi Bani||Israil
words.en: Not||he||(was) except||a slave||We bestowed Our favor||on him||and We made him||an example||for (the) Children of Israel||for (the) Children of Israel

translations.text: in huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa alaihi Wa-ja'alnaahu masalan li-Baneee israaa'eel

words.id: dan jika||Kami menghendaki||niscaya Kami jadikan||dari kamu||malaikat-malaikat||di muka||bumi||mereka menggantikan
words.en: And if||We willed||surely We (could have) made||among you||Angels||in||the earth||succeeding

translations.text: Wa-law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya ia||benar-benar pengetahuan||tentang hari kiamat||maka janganlah||kamu ragu-ragu||dengannya||dan ikutilah Aku||ini||jalan||lurus
words.en: And indeed it||surely (is) a knowledge||of the Hour||So (do) not||(be) doubtful||about it||and follow Me||This||(is the) Path||Straight

translations.text: Wa-innahoo la-'ilmun lis-Saa'ati fa-laa tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatun Mustaqeem

words.id: dan jangan||memalingkan kamu||syaitan||sesungguhnya dia||bagi kalian||musuh||nyata
words.en: And (let) not||avert you||the Shaitaan||Indeed he||(is) for you||an enemy||clear

translations.text: Wa-laa yasuddan-nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwun mubeen

words.id: dan tatkala||datang||'Isa||dengan keterangan||dia berkata||sesungguhnya||aku datang kepadamu||dengan hikmah||dan untuk aku jelaskan||bagi kalian||sebagian||yang||kamu perselisihkan||didalamnya||maka bertakwalah||Allah||dan taatilah aku
words.en: And when||came||Isa||with clear proofs||he said||Verily||I have come to you||with wisdom||and that I make clear||to you||some||(of) that which||you differ||in it||So fear||Allah||and obey me

translations.text: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil-Hikmati Wa-li-ubaiyyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha Wa-atee'oon

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||Dia||Tuhanku||dan Tuhanmu||maka sembahlah Dia||ini||jalan||lurus
words.en: Indeed||Allah||He||(is) my Lord||and your Lord||so worship Him||This||(is) a Path||Straight

translations.text: innal laaha Huwa Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem

words.id: maka berselisih||beberapa golongan||dari||antara mereka||maka kecelakaanlah||bagi orang-orang yang||zalim||dari||azab||hari||pedih
words.en: But differed||the factions||from||among them||so woe||to those who||wronged||from||(the) punishment||(of the) Day||painful

translations.text: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fa-wailun lil-lazeena zalamoo min azaabi Yawmin aleem

words.id: tidakkah||mereka menunggu||kecuali||hari kiamat||bahwa||ia datang kepada mereka||dengan tiba-tiba||dan mereka||tidak||mereka menyadari
words.en: Are||they waiting||except||(for) the Hour||that||it should come on them||suddenly||while they||(do) not||perceive

translations.text: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.id: sahabat-sahabat akrab||pada hari itu||sebagian mereka||bagi sebagian||musuh||kecuali||orang-orang yang bertakwa
words.en: Friends||that Day||some of them||to others||(will be) enemies||except||the righteous

translations.text: Al-akhillaaa'u Yawma'izin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen

words.id: hai hamba-hambaKu||tidak ada||ketakutan||atas kalian||pada hari itu||dan tidak||kamu||kamu bersedih
words.en: O My slaves!||No||fear||on you||this Day||and not||you||will grieve

translations.text: Yaa-'ibaadi laa khawfun alaikumul Yawma Wa-laaa antum tahzanoon

words.id: orang-orang yang||beriman||kepada ayat-ayat Kami||dan adalah mereka||orang-orang yang berserah diri
words.en: Those who||believed||in Our Verses||and were||submissive

translations.text: Allazeena aamanoo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-kaanoo muslimeen

words.id: masuklah||surga||kamu||dan isteri-isterimu||kamu digembirakan
words.en: Enter||Paradise||you||and your spouses||delighted

translations.text: Udkhulul Jannata antum Wa-azwaajukum tuhbaroon

words.id: dikelilingi||kepada mereka||dengan piring-piring||dari||emas||dan piala-piala||dan didalamnya(surga)||apa yang||diingininya||jiwa/hati||dan sedap||mata||dan kalian||didalamnya||mereka kekal
words.en: Will be circulated||for them||plates||of||gold||and cups||And therein||(is) what||desires||the souls||and delights||the eyes||and you||therein||will abide forever

translations.text: Yutaafu alaihim bisihaa-fim min zahabinw Wa-akwaab, Wa-feehaa maa tashtaheehil anfusu Wa-talazzul a'yunu Wa-antum feehaa khaalidoon

words.id: dan itulah||surga||yang||diwariskan kepadanya||sebab||kalian adalah||kamu kerjakan
words.en: And this||(is) the Paradise||which||you are made to inherit||for what||you used (to)||do

translations.text: Wa-tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: bagi kalian||didalamnya||buah-buahan||banyak||daripadanya||kamu makan
words.en: For you||therein||(are) fruits||abundant||from it||you will eat

translations.text: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratun minhaa ta'kuloon

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang berdosa||dalam||azab||neraka jahanam||mereka kekal
words.en: Indeed||the criminals||(will be) in||(the) punishment||(of) Hell||abiding forever

translations.text: innal mujrimeena fee azaabi jahannama khaalidoon

words.id: tidak||diringankan||dari mereka||dan mereka||didalamnya||orang-orang yang berputus asa
words.en: Not||will it subside||for them||and they||in it||(will) despair

translations.text: Laa yufattaru 'anhum Wa-hum feehi mublisoon

words.id: dan tidaklah||Kami menganiaya mereka||tetapi||adalah mereka||mereka||orang-orang yang zalim/aniaya
words.en: And not||We wronged them||but||they were||themselves||wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen

words.en: And they will call||O Malik!||Let put an end||to us||your Lord||He (will) say||Indeed you||(will) remain

translations.text: Wa-naadaw yaa-Maaliku liyaqdi alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakithoon

words.id: sesungguhnya||Kami datang kepadamu||dengan kebenaran||tetapi||kebanyakan kamu||pada kebenaran||benci
words.en: Certainly||We have brought you||the truth||but||most of you||to the truth||(are) averse

translations.text: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarakum lil-haqqi kaarihoon

words.id: bahkan||mereka menetapkan||suatu perkara||maka sesungguhnya Kami||menetapkan
words.en: Or||have they determined||an affair||Then indeed We||(are) determined

translations.text: Am abramooo amran fainnaa mubrimoon

words.id: atau||mereka mengira||bahwasanya kami||tidak||mendengar||rahasia mereka||dan bisik-bisik mereka||ya/sebenarnya||dan utusan-utusan Kami||di sisi mereka||mereka tulis
words.en: Or||(do) they think||that We||(can) not||hear||their secret(s)||and their private counsel(s)||Nay||and Our Messengers||with them||are recording

translations.text: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum Wa-najwaahum; balaa Wa-Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon

words.id: katakanlah||jika||adalah||bagi Yang Maha Pengasih||seorang anak||maka aku||pertama-tama||orang yang menyembah
words.en: Say||If||had||the Most Gracious||a son||Then I||(would be the) first||(of) the worshippers

translations.text: Qul in kaana lir-Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul aabideen

words.id: Maha Suci||Tuhan/Pemelihara||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||Tuhan/Pemelihara||'Arsy||dari apa||mereka sifatkan
words.en: Glory be||(to the) Lord||(of) the heavens||and the earth||(the) Lord||(of) the Throne||above what||they ascribe

translations.text: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon

words.id: maka biarkanlah mereka||mereka sesat||dan mereka bermain-main||sehingga||mereka menemui||hari mereka||yang||mereka dijanjikan
words.en: So leave them||(to) converse vainly||and play||until||they meet||their Day||which||they are promised

translations.text: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon

words.id: dan Dia||yang||di||langit||Tuhan||dan di||bumi||Tuhan||dan Dia||Maha Bijaksana||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||(is) in||the heaven||God||and in||the earth||God||And He||(is) the All-Wise||the All-Knower

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee fis samaaa'i ilaahunw Wa-fil ardi ilaah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul 'Aleem

words.id: dan Maha Suci Engkau||yang||bagi-Nya||kerajaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan apa yang||diantara keduanya||dan di sisi-Nya||pengetahuan||hari kiamat||dan kepada-Nya||kalian dikembalikan
words.en: And blessed is||the One Who||to Whom||(belongs the) dominion||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and whatever||(is) between both of them||and with Him||(is the) knowledge||(of) the Hour||and to Him||you will be returned

translations.text: Wa-tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-'indahoo ilmus Saa'ati Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

words.id: dan tidak||memiliki||orang-orang yang||mereka sembah||dari||selain||pertolongan/syafa'at||kecuali||orang||dia menyaksikan/mengakui||dengan yang benar||dan mereka||mereka mengetahui
words.en: And not||have power||those whom||they invoke||besides Him||besides Him||(for) the intercession||except||who||testifies||to the truth||and they||know

translations.text: Wa-laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi Wa-hum ya'lamoon

words.en: And if||you ask them||who||created them||they will certainly say||Allah||Then how||are they deluded

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqahum la-yaqoolun nallaahu fa-annaa yu'fakoon

words.id: dan perkataannya||wahai Tuhanku||sesungguhnya||mereka itu||kaum||tidak||mereka beriman
words.en: And his saying||O my Lord!||Indeed||these||(are) a people||(who do) not||believe

translations.text: Wa-qeelihee yaa-Rabbi inna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon

words.id: maka maafkanlah||dari mereka||dan katakanlah||selamat/sejahtera||maka kelak||mereka akan mengetahui
words.en: So turn away||from them||and say||Peace||But soon||they will know

translations.text: Fasfah 'anhum Wa-qul salaam; fasawfa ya'lamoon
